column2: SELECT TOP # za.specObjID, za.bestObjID, za.class, za.subClass, za.z, za.zErr, po.objID, po.type, po.flags, po.ra, po.dec, zp.z as zphot, zp.zErr as dzphot, zi.e_bv_sfd, zi.primtarget, zi.sectarget, zi.targettype, zi.spectrotype, zi.subclass FROM SpecObjAll AS za JOIN PhotoObjAll AS po ON (po.objID = za.bestObjID) JOIN Photoz AS zp ON (zp.objID = za.bestObjID) JOIN galSpecInfo AS zi ON (zi.SpecObjID = za.specObjID) WHERE za.z > # and za.zWarning = # and za.targetType = SCIENCE and za.survey = sdss and za.class = GALAXY and zi.primtarget = # and po.clean = # and po.insideMask = # and dered_petro_r = #
